commands.name: Custom command 1 > Basic
commands.message: Test command was called $(COUNT) time$(IF_GREATER=$(COUNT)>1|s) (random number between 1 and 10: $(RANDOM_NUMBER=1<->10))

commands.name: Custom command 2 > RegEx groups
commands.message: Test command query is: $(IF_NOT_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|'$(REGEX_GROUP=1)')$(IF_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|There was no query :()

commands.name: Custom command 4.1 > Using the Twitch api > get game
commands.message: /announce Go check out $(REGEX_GROUP=1) at https://www.twitch.tv/$(REGEX_GROUP=1) <3 They were last playing $(TWITCH_API_GET_GAME=$(REGEX_GROUP=1))

commands.name: Custom command 4.2 > Using the Twitch api > get follow age
Custom command 4.3 > Using the Twitch api > set/get title [user:edit:broadcast scope necessary to set the title]
commands.message: @$(USER) $(IF_NOT_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|You updated the title to '$(TWITCH_API_SET_TITLE=$(REGEX_GROUP=1))')$(IF_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|The current title is '$(TWITCH_API_GET_TITLE)')

commands.name: Custom command 4.4 > Using the Twitch api > set/get game [user:edit:broadcast scope necessary to set the game]
commands.message: @$(USER) $(IF_NOT_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|You updated the game to '$(TWITCH_API_SET_GAME=$(REGEX_GROUP=1))')$(IF_UNDEFINED=$(REGEX_GROUP=1)|The current game is '$(TWITCH_API_GET_GAME)')

commands.name: Custom command 5.1 > Death counter using the custom command global data (add)
commands.message: death was added, streamer died $(ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND_DATA=death+=1) times

commands.name: Custom command 5.2 > Death counter using the custom command global data (get)
Custom command 5.3 > Death counter using the custom command global data (remove)
commands.message: death was removed, streamer died $(REMOVE_CUSTOM_COMMAND_DATA=death-=1) times

commands.name: Custom command 5.4 > Death counter using the custom command global data (reset)
commands.message: death was reset, streamer died $(SET_CUSTOM_COMMAND_DATA=death==0) times

commands.name: Custom command 6 > Cooldown for a command
commands.message: This command can only be executed ever 30s
